differences.description: Reference shows sparse scattered dots with minimal connecting lines. Clone shows dense spherical mesh network with heavy interconnections.
differences.reference: Scattered individual dots, sparse connections, organic layout
differences.current: Dense spherical/geodesic mesh, heavy line density, geometric layout
differences.fix: Reduce node count and connection density in network-visualization.tsx. Use force-directed sparse layout instead of geodesic sphere.

differences.description: Reference has 5 badges (1 country + 4 levels). Clone has 10 badges (6 countries + 4 levels).
differences.reference: Switzerland | Executive Level | Mid Level | Senior Level | Entry Level
differences.current: Switzerland | Executive | Senior | Mid | Entry | United States | United Kingdom | Germany | Australia | Canada
differences.fix: Reduce visible country badges to match reference state. Show only selected country filter.

differences.description: Reference badges say 'Executive Level', 'Mid Level', etc. Clone badges say just 'Executive', 'Senior', etc.
differences.reference: Executive Level, Mid Level, Senior Level, Entry Level
differences.fix: Add 'Level' suffix to career level badge labels in filter-badges.tsx

differences.description: Clone shows TEST HISTORY section with items (Instagram Post 66%, TikTok Script 76%). Reference does not show this section in default state.
differences.current: TEST HISTORY header with 2 test items showing percentages
differences.fix: Hide TEST HISTORY section when no test is selected, or match reference collapsed state

differences.description: Clone has 'Create a new test' button in top-right corner of main area. Reference only shows it in sidebar.
differences.reference: Create a new test button only in sidebar
differences.current: Create a new test button in both sidebar AND top-right corner
differences.fix: Remove duplicate 'Create a new test' button from top-right header area

differences.description: Reference shows 'Version 2.1' text at bottom of sidebar. Clone may not show this.
differences.current: Version text not visible in screenshot
differences.fix: Add version number display below Log Out button in sidebar

differences.description: Clone shows red '2 Issues' badge in bottom-left corner. Reference does not have this.
differences.fix: Remove or hide the issues indicator badge - this appears to be a dev tool

differences.description: Sidebar widths appear similar but clone may be slightly wider
differences.fix: Verify sidebar width matches reference exactly - check w-[230px] or similar

differences.description: Dropdown styling appears consistent but needs verification of border-radius and padding
differences.current: Dark dropdown with chevron - appears similar
differences.fix: Verify exact border-radius, padding, and background color match

differences.description: Node colors in visualization need verification
differences.current: Blue, Green, Pink, Orange, Purple, Red nodes
differences.fix: Verify node color palette matches reference exactly

critical_fixes: DASH-001: Network visualization structure is fundamentally different - needs major rework
DASH-002: Too many filter badges visible - reduce to match reference
DASH-004: Hide TEST HISTORY section in default dashboard state
elements_to_remove: DASH-005: Duplicate 'Create a new test' button in header
missing_elements: DASH-006: Version number text below Log Out
